name: Verify the button alignment on the T& A screen
testScript:
Given:
  • Logged on as a neuven user with T& A permissions. 
When:
  • Adding a user time and attendance. 
Then:
  • On the sub section after the intial creation of T& A screen.  The button to add more lines for breaks, is displaying correctly.
justification: This test focuses on UI elements (button alignment), which is important but doesn't involve critical business processes, complex functionality, or security. It ensures correct display without deeper integration or functionality checks.

name: Verify that the IBAN field character limit is 34
Verify that the BIC field is alphanumeric with a character limit of 12
justification: Covers basic validation (alphanumeric and character limit check).

name: Verify the name of the columns in the document names table
justification: Tests basic UI consistency but does not cover critical or complex functionality.

name: Verify the page size dropdown above the document name table
justification: Tests basic pagination functionality, which is non-critical.

name: Verify the pagination below the document name table
justification: Similar to above, pagination is important but not critical for regression.

name: Verify all the spellings and alignment on the Document name maintenance page
justification: UI consistency check. Important for user experience but not critical for functionality.

name: Verify that in the Action Column, no upload is shown as ‘No action required’
justification: This test case is more about UI display and less about critical functionality or integrations, meeting only the critical business process criterion.

name: Verify the renaming of the 'documents' to 'Agency worker Documents' when logged in as a client user.
testScript:
Given:
  • Logged on as a client user
When:
  • On the side navigation menu. 
Then:
  • Verify that there is a menu option called 'Agency Worker Documents'.
  • This option will appear after the timesheet option on the side menu. 
  • Verify that there is no option called 'Documents'.
justification: UI text change verification, low complexity and limited business impact.

name: Verify the spelling on country of license has been corrected on the page RTW section on the compliance tab for direct bank workers
testScript:
Given:

  • Logged in as a Neuven user with ‘Manage Direct Bank worker Permission'

  • OR

  • Client user

When:
  • On direct workers page when adding a new direct worker profile/ editing a direct worker.
Then:
  • The country of license label has had its spelling corrected
  • from country of licence.
  • to county of license.
justification: Minor detail correction, low complexity, security relevance, and business impact.
